pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Nominate a project for the 2019 sales leadership award

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The sales leadership recognizes high performing technology sales leaders that embody the ideals of customer oriented leadership.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: How to calibrate your own strengths and weaknesses

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Smart self-assessment plus clearly defined requests for feedback can prevent imposter syndrome—and being caught off-guard by hidden weaknesses.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: What's the difference between customer support and customer engagement

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
The terms “customer service” and “customer experience” are often confused or used interchangeably. They’re not the same thing, but they are related.

The difference between customer service and customer experience is that while customer service is one piece of the puzzle — focused on human interaction and directly supporting customers — customer experience is the sum of the entire customer journey with your business.
Is customer service part of the customer experience? Or is customer experience what happens when someone receives customer service? Are they the same thing?

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: How to be an Ethical Influencer

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: In a role that’s often tagged as disingenuous, it’s difficult—but not impossible—to maintain your integrity and ensure you’re deserving of your followers’ trust

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: How machine learning can drive retail sales

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As the shopping experience becomes more and more integrated, retailers tend to adopt an omnichannel sales approach. This means that a customer may seamlessly switch across the multitude of sales channels, shopping online from a desktop or mobile device, by telephone or in a bricks and mortar stores.

The number one piece of advice I have for salespeople is you have to market in the moment we live. You have to reverse engineer consumer attention and deploy all of your time, energy and resources into producing content for that specific behavior.
If you remote access to corporate resources, you need to check out Marketing's new simplified VPN connection procedure.​

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Changes in Denver legislation to be incorporated before new product launch

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: ​​As of this month some significant changes will be made to the Denver contract codes. An outline of the prospective changes is available in the Legislative Codes section. Planning meeting Announcement to follow.
This quarter our consumer business had some bright spots, while also experiencing substantial usage headwinds over and around Easter weekend.

Successful product growth and engagement is fundamentally linked to whether customers understand and realize the value it offers. While all product teams aspire to create an elegant user experience and functionality that enables customers to intuitively “get it” after they try it, product marketers are focused on conveying the product’s value to the customer to engage, convert and retain them. Product marketers play a key role in driving awareness and trial as well as packaging the product to appeal to customers. They accomplish this by packaging a product’s features and functionality into messaging and positioning, pricing, and collateral.
Congratulations Contoso team! This September we set a new annual sales record.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Contoso Eagle launch and the future

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
We have lift off!

This year at the FlySafe Conference I had the opportunity to give the keynote address, with more then 6,000 attendees and press, on advancements in drone technology for the professional and consumer market with a hint to what the future of our industry holds.  

It was an honor to represent the results of your hard work and dedication on our products.  If you haven't already had a chance please watch the summary of our product updates.

Improve execution & engagement

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Add your text here
We would like to congratulate Adele Vance on a job well done this month.

The number one piece of advice I have for salespeople is you have to market in the moment we live. You have to reverse engineer consumer attention and deploy all of your time, energy and resources into producing content for that specific behavior.
This quarter our consumer business had some bright spots, while also experiencing substantial usage headwinds over and around Easter weekend.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: What's the difference between customer support and customer engagement

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
The terms “customer service” and “customer experience” are often confused or used interchangeably. They’re not the same thing, but they are related.

The difference between customer service and customer experience is that while customer service is one piece of the puzzle — focused on human interaction and directly supporting customers — customer experience is the sum of the entire customer journey with your business.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Nominate a project for the 2019 sales leadership award

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The sales leadership recognizes high performing technology sales leaders that embody the ideals of customer oriented leadership.
Congratulations Contoso team! This September we set a new annual sales record.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Retail store opening and closing procedure

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Establishing opening and closing procedures that leave as little to chance as possible can really help. Handled correctly, these two key periods of your day will leave you free to deal with the urgent details that tend to come up for most retailers. They also allow your employees to focus on what is most important, taking care of your customers.
Design and aesthetics are a major part of the shopping experience. Design is both art and science, often using data to help make choices, such as product display and placement.

Much of a store’s success depends on customer service - how it treats its customers. Customers may not always be right, but they’re always the customer, representing a potential sale and potential review.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Why customer service is the new marketing

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Out of every 10,000 companies that claim they offer ‘a superior customer experience’, only 100 or so are actually delivering it.

That’s one out of 100. Ouch.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The number one piece of advice I have for salespeople is you have to market in the moment we live. You have to reverse engineer consumer attention and deploy all of your time, energy and resources into producing content for that specific behavior.
We would like to congratulate Grady Archie on a job well done this month.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Retail store opening and closing procedure

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Establishing opening and closing procedures that leave as little to chance as possible can really help. Handled correctly, these two key periods of your day will leave you free to deal with the urgent details that tend to come up for most retailers. They also allow your employees to focus on what is most important, taking care of your customers.

Much of a store’s success depends on customer service - how it treats its customers. Customers may not always be right, but they’re always the customer, representing a potential sale and potential review.
